definition: unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
to curve/to return/to revolve
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
variant of 迴|回[hui2]
day/sky/heaven
short of/tired
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
method/technique

sentences.english: There was no hope for Spitz now.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮兹现在是回天乏术了。

sentences.english: So the balance is clined seriously. my left hand failed.
sentences.chinese: 于是天平严重倾斜，大势已去，我的左手回天乏术。

definition: unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
incurable/no way of curing/hopeless
lit. the disease has attacked the vitals (idiom); fig. beyond cure/the situation is hopeless
in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
already too late
to no avail/of no use
to be at death's door (idiom)
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
unhelpful/useless
to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help

dying/at one's last gasp
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
irrevocable/the die is cast
everything bodes ill, no positive signs (idiom); inauspicious/everything points to disaster
